message.body: Gotta say I'm a tad disappointed that absolutely no one from work checked in with me to see if I was ok. Turns out I had borderline heatstroke, a very serious condition :/
Ate you ok this is the first I'm hearing about it

I should be ok. Still sick, but much better than i was. I called Josh last night in a delerium, lol. Yelled n sobbed. That's why I wasn't in today. Off tomorrow, should be good by Tuesday. It was horrific.
I glad to hear your doing better I'm sorry you had to work in that heat I am on a mission to either have Matt fix the AC or I get fans because this can not
keep going on. Hope you feel better get some rest lots of water and will see ya on Tuesday
